metadata.description: This data set includes the distribution products of 30 m cultivated land and construction land in Qilian mountain area from 1985 to 2019. The product comes from the land cover classification products of 30m in Qilian mountain area from 1985 to 2019. NDVI products, light data products, DEM products and SAR data of sentry 1 are used in the production of the products. The total accuracy of the product is better than 85%. Among them,  the peoducts from 1985-2015 have a 5 year- time resolution, and the other products have a 1 year - time resolution.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括祁连山区域1985-2019年的30m耕地和建设用地分布产品。该产品来源于祁连山区域1985-2019年30m的土地覆盖分类产品。产品生产时使用了NDVI 产品、灯光数据产品、DEM产品和哨兵1号的SAR数据。使用变化监测的方法，在2015年产品的基础上生产出其他年份的产品。产品的总精度优于85%。其中，1985-2015年的土地利用产品为5年1期，2015-2019年的土地利用产品为1年1期。

background: Land-cover datasets are crucial for research on eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling. Remote sensing has become widely used as a macro-observing system for land-cover mapping, which can substitute for plant functional type (PFT) as the baseline. Several moderate to fine resolution global land-cover datasets, which are presented in detail in Table I, based on different satellite sensors are available from different research groups. These land-cover datasets listed in Table I have large variability for three reasons: 1) the data quality and properties are different; 2) there is no standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories; and 3) they are not consistent with the Earth System Model’s (ESM) requirements, because the concept of PFT, whose traits represent a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions, used in ESMs cannot be mapped directly using remote-sensing land-cover datasets. In addition, the classification accuracies of land-cover datasets vary and are hardly suited for land-process modeling and applications at a river basin scale. The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. For the HRB, most are distributed over an arid region, so the vegetation classification in the HRB based on current land-cover datasets would cause very large uncertainty and may cause great error or even the failure of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
research objective: In order to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in the HRB, a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation is developed by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands.
challenges: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. For the HRB, most are distributed over an arid region, so the vegetation classification in the HRB based on current land-cover datasets would cause very large uncertainty and may cause great error or even the failure of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
methods: A mosaic of the HRB is made using Landsat/TM imagery. The mosaic of Landsat/TM is used as the base image and all HJ-1/CCD images are automatically corrected through the image-to-image registration method. Converting the DN values of the HJ-1/CCD images to top of atmosphere (TOA) radiance with given calibration coefficients. Removing the atmospheric effects of remote-sensing images to obtain the surface reflectance. After the preprocessing has been done, all the HJ-1/CCD images within 1 month are subset and mosaicked; consequently, 10 mosaics for 10 months in the HRB are made and time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD are constructed.
dataset: The HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data used in this research were provided by the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application (CRESDA, http://www.cresda.com). The Landsat TM/ETM+ data were downloaded from the USGS website (http://landsat.usgs.gov/). The MODIS data were downloaded from the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/). The VHSR data were from Google Earth by Google Inc.
findings: The confusion matrix is used to evaluate the classification accuracy, showing an overall classification accuracy of over 90% in the HRB, which is quite higher than previous approaches. Furthermore, a ground campaign was performed to evaluate the accuracy of crop classification and an overall accuracy of 84.09% for the crop classification was achieved.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模的研究至关重要。遥感已成为广泛使用的宏观观测系统，用于土地覆盖制图，可以作为植物功能类型（PFT）的基线。根据不同的卫星传感器，多个中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集可供不同研究小组使用，这些数据集在表I中详细列出。这些土地覆盖数据集的变异性很大，原因有三：1）数据质量和属性不同；2）将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别没有标准方法；3）它们与地球系统模型（ESM）的要求不一致，因为在ESM中使用的PFT概念，其特征代表了一系列光谱关系、气候、生态和理论假设的组合，无法直接通过遥感土地覆盖数据集进行映射。此外，土地覆盖数据集的分类准确性差异很大，难以适用于流域尺度的土地过程建模和应用。光学遥感影像中土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，因为森林覆盖所需的最小阈值存在差异。对于HRB，大部分分布在干旱地区，因此基于当前土地覆盖数据集的HRB植被分类将导致非常大的不确定性，并可能导致生态水文和土地过程建模的重大错误甚至失败。
research objectiveCn: 为了提高HRB地区生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，开发了一种综合方法，通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，绘制具有细致空间分辨率和更多作物/植被类别的月度土地覆盖图。
challengesCn: 光学遥感影像中的土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱系统中灌木、草地和森林类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异。在HRB（黄河流域），大多数地区分布在干旱区域，因此基于当前土地覆盖数据集的HRB植被分类将导致非常大的不确定性，并可能造成重大错误，甚至导致生态水文和土地过程建模的失败。
methodsCn: HRB的马赛克是使用Landsat/TM影像制作的。Landsat/TM的马赛克作为基础影像，所有HJ-1/CCD影像通过图像间配准方法自动校正。使用给定的校准系数将HJ-1/CCD影像的DN值转换为大气顶辐射率（TOA）进行处理。去除遥感影像的气象效应以获得表面反射率。在完成预处理后，所有在1个月内的HJ-1/CCD影像被子集化并拼接；因此，HRB在10个月内制作了10个马赛克，并构建了HJ-1/CCD的时间序列马赛克。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的HJ-1/CCD遥感数据由中国资源卫星数据与应用中心（CRESDA，http://www.cresda.com）提供。Landsat TM/ETM+数据从USGS网站（http://landsat.usgs.gov/）下载。MODIS数据从NASA戈达德太空飞行中心（http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/）下载。VHSR数据来自谷歌公司（Google Inc.）的谷歌地球（Google Earth）。
findingsCn: 混淆矩阵用于评估分类准确性，HRB的整体分类准确率超过90%，这比之前的方法高得多。此外，进行了地面调查以评估作物分类的准确性，最终实现了84.09%的整体作物分类准确率。

background: It is very difficult to have remote sensing data with both high spatial resolution and high temporal frequency; thus, two categories of land-use mapping methodology have been developed separately for coarser resolution and finer resolution data. Land use and land cover are the key factors for understanding the interactions between global changes and human activities, such as social, economic, and cultural activities. Moreover, it is one of the key parameters of land process modeling, and more accurate land use and land cover data will improve the accuracy of ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric models. Consequently, land use and land cover data are now widely used in many kinds of researches, such as biodiversity, carbon cycle, public health, crop yield estimation, urban sprawl, forest monitoring, and so on. Since land cover/use can be retrieved straightforwardly from remote sensing, many land cover/use mapping methods using remotely sensed data have been developed for the purposes of regional or global applications.
research objective: Therefore, by taking the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data we propose a new method for finer resolution land cover mapping using the time series HJ-1/CCD data, which can greatly improve the land cover mapping accuracy.
challenges: This method uses much more data and dramatically increases the computation loading; the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
methods: In our two study areas, the very high resolution remote sensing data within Google Earth are used to validate the land cover mapping results, which shows a very high mapping accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% and a high Kappa coefficient of 0.9423 and 0.8165 in the Dahuofang area of Liaoning Province and the Heiquan area of Gansu Province respectively.
dataset: The HJ-1 satellite constellation consists of three satellites, named as HJ-1A, HJ-1B, and HJ-1C respectively. For CCD cameras, their nominal spatial resolution is 30 m. HJ-1/CCDs have three visible bands (430–520 nm, 520–600 nm, and 630–690 nm) and one near-infrared band (760–900 nm). The time series data are composed of one dataset per month, so this time series of data can depict the variation of typical land surface.
findings: The overall accuracy for classification result using the time series of HJ-1/CCD data is 96.76% and the Kappa coefficient is 0.9423; the corresponding overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient for classification result using single Hj-1/CCD data are 87.59% and 0.8296 respectively. Compared with the classification result from single Hj-1/CCD data, the overall accuracy of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data is more than 10% and the Kappa coefficient is more than 0.1. The overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data are 83.78% and 0.8165 respectively; those using single HJ-1/CCD data are 70.82% and 0.665 respectively. It is similar to the comparison in the Dahuofang area that the overall accuracy of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data is also 10% higher and Kappa coefficient is also 0.1 higher than that of classification result using single HJ-1/CCD data.
backgroundCn: 由于高空间分辨率和高时间频率的遥感数据很难获得，因此分别为较粗分辨率和较细分辨率数据开发了两类土地利用制图方法。土地利用和土地覆盖是理解全球变化与人类活动（如社会、经济和文化活动）之间相互作用的关键因素。此外，它们是土地过程建模的关键参数，更准确的土地利用和土地覆盖数据将提高生态、水文和大气模型的准确性。因此，土地利用和土地覆盖数据现在广泛应用于许多研究领域，如生物多样性、碳循环、公共健康、作物产量估计、城市扩张、森林监测等。由于土地覆盖/利用可以通过遥感直接获取，因此已经开发了许多利用遥感数据进行土地覆盖/利用制图的方法，以满足区域或全球应用的需要。
research objectiveCn: 因此，通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，我们提出了一种新的方法，利用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行更精细的土地覆盖制图，这可以大大提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。
challengesCn: 该方法使用了更多的数据，并显著增加了计算负载；HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳降低了其可用性，并增加了使用上的难度。
methodsCn: 在我们的两个研究区域，使用Google Earth中的超高分辨率遥感数据来验证土地覆盖制图结果，显示出大连高的制图准确率，分别为95.76%和83.78%，以及高Kappa系数，分别为0.9423和0.8165，位于辽宁省的大伙房地区和甘肃省的黑泉地区。
datasetCn: HJ-1卫星星座由三颗卫星组成，分别命名为HJ-1A、HJ-1B和HJ-1C。对于CCD相机，它们的标称空间分辨率为30米。HJ-1/CCD具有三个可见光波段（430–520纳米、520–600纳米和630–690纳米）和一个近红外波段（760–900纳米）。时间序列数据由每月一个数据集组成，因此这组时间序列数据可以描绘典型陆地表面的变化。
findingsCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据的时间序列进行分类的整体准确率为96.76%，Kappa系数为0.9423；而使用单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果对应的整体准确率和Kappa系数分别为87.59%和0.8296。与单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果相比，使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果整体准确率提高了10%以上，Kappa系数提高了0.1以上。使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的整体准确率和Kappa系数分别为83.78%和0.8165；而使用单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的整体准确率和Kappa系数分别为70.82%和0.665。与大伙房地区的比较类似，使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的整体准确率也比单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果高出10%，Kappa系数也高出0.1。

Verification.QuestionCn: 遥感数据如HJ-1/CCD的几何和辐射质量存在挑战，这会影响其可用性吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which remote sensing data source is more suitable for land cover mapping in arid regions, HJ-1/CCD, Landsat TM/ETM+, or MODIS?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪个遥感数据源更适合在干旱地区进行土地覆盖制图，HJ-1/CCD、Landsat TM/ETM+ 还是 MODIS？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main satellite sensors used for generating land-cover datasets in this field?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在该领域中，用于生成土地覆盖数据集的主要卫星传感器有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where do the challenges of land-cover classification accuracy primarily occur in this field?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 土地覆盖分类准确性面临的挑战主要发生在这个领域的哪些方面？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that improves land cover mapping accuracy using remotely sensed data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，该方法使用遥感数据提高土地覆盖制图的准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: One example is utilizing the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data to develop a method for finer resolution land cover mapping, which involves using time series data composed of one dataset per month to depict land surface variations. This approach significantly improves land cover mapping accuracy as demonstrated in regions like the Dahuofang area of Liaoning Province.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个例子是利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，开发一种更精细的土地覆盖制图方法，该方法涉及使用每月一个数据集的时间序列数据来描绘地表变化。这种方法显著提高了土地覆盖制图的准确性，正如在辽宁省的大伙房地区所示。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in land-cover classification using optical remotely sensed imagery?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A common challenge is the high uncertainty in land-cover classification, particularly between cropland and grassland categories, as well as in dryland systems among shrub, grassland, and forest categories due to differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. This challenge is especially prevalent in arid regions such as the HRB.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个常见的挑战是土地覆盖分类中的高不确定性，特别是在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，由于森林覆盖的最低阈值要求存在差异。这一挑战在干旱地区，如HRB，尤其明显。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used for land cover classification in the context of eco-hydrological modeling?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于生态水文模型中土地覆盖分类的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used is the HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data provided by the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application, which is utilized in combination with Landsat TM/ETM+ and MODIS data for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution to improve eco-hydrological modeling accuracy.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个使用的数据集是由中国资源卫星应用中心提供的HJ-1/CCD遥感数据，该数据与Landsat TM/ETM+和MODIS数据结合，用于以细致的空间分辨率绘制每月土地覆盖图，以提高生态水文模型的准确性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features of the data collection methods used for land cover classification in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于干旱地区土地覆盖分类的数据收集方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: remote-sensing data, Landsat/TM, HJ-1/CCD, MODIS, VHSR, image-to-image registration, DN values to TOA radiance, removing atmospheric effects, surface reflectance, time series mosaics
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 遥感数据，Landsat/TM，HJ-1/CCD，MODIS，VHSR，图像到图像配准，DN值转换为TOA辐射，去除大气效应，地表反射率，时间序列镶嵌。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes of remote-sensing data influence the accuracy of land cover mapping?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 影响土地覆盖制图准确性的遥感数据属性有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spatial resolution, temporal frequency, geometric qualities, radiometric qualities, use of multiple classifiers, multisource data
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 空间分辨率、时间频率、几何特性、辐射特性、使用多分类器、多源数据

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many visible bands are there in the HJ-1/CCD sensors used for remote sensing data collection?
Quantification.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD传感器用于遥感数据采集时，有多少个可见波段？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the overall classification accuracy achieved using the time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用时序HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图所达到的整体分类准确率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'land-cover dataset' mean in the context of eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文过程和地球系统建模的背景下，“土地覆盖数据集”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Land-cover datasets are crucial for research on eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling, as they allow for land-cover mapping using remote sensing, which can serve as a substitute for plant functional type (PFT) as the baseline. These datasets are based on satellite sensors and vary due to differences in data quality, classification approaches, and their alignment with Earth System Model requirements.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模的研究至关重要，因为它们允许使用遥感进行土地覆盖制图，这可以作为植物功能类型（PFT）的替代基线。这些数据集基于卫星传感器，由于数据质量、分类方法的差异以及与地球系统模型要求的对齐程度不同而有所不同。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a 'mosaic' in the context of remote sensing imagery for land-cover mapping?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感图像用于土地覆盖制图的背景下，“镶嵌图”是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A mosaic in the context of remote sensing imagery refers to the process of using imagery from sources such as Landsat/TM to create a base image, which is then used for automatic correction of other images like HJ-1/CCD through image-to-image registration. This process helps in producing a time series of mosaics for consistent land-cover mapping over a specified region.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在遥感影像的背景下，马赛克指的是使用来自Landsat/TM等来源的影像创建基础影像的过程，然后通过影像间配准自动校正其他影像，如HJ-1/CCD。这一过程有助于在指定区域内生成一致的土地覆盖制图时间序列。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'time series HJ-1/CCD data' mean for finer resolution land cover mapping?
Definition.QuestionCn: “时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据”在更高分辨率的土地覆盖制图中是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Time series HJ-1/CCD data refers to a dataset composed of multiple images captured over different times, typically one per month, which allows for detailed depiction of land surface variations. This approach significantly enhances the accuracy of land cover mapping by utilizing the temporal and spatial advantages of the HJ-1/CCD satellite constellation.
Definition.AnswerCn: 时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据是指由多个在不同时间捕获的图像组成的数据集，通常每月一幅，这使得对地表变化的详细描绘成为可能。这种方法通过利用HJ-1/CCD卫星星座的时间和空间优势，显著提高了土地覆盖制图的准确性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in computational load and usability challenges between using time series data versus single-time data for land cover mapping?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列数据与单时间数据进行土地覆盖制图在计算负载和可用性挑战方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Time series data significantly increase computational load compared to single-time data, due to the greater volume of data processed. Although the time series approach enhances mapping accuracy, the geometric and radiometric qualities of some data, like HJ-1/CCD, can lower usability and pose additional challenges.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 时间序列数据相比于单时间数据显著增加了计算负担，因为处理的数据量更大。尽管时间序列方法提高了映射精度，但某些数据（如HJ-1/CCD）的几何和辐射特性可能降低可用性，并带来额外挑战。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the development of a more detailed land cover dataset impact the accuracy of ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 更详细的土地覆盖数据集的开发可以通过哪些方式影响生态、水文和大气模型的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The development of a more detailed land cover dataset can significantly enhance the accuracy of ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric models by providing precise input parameters. This improvement is crucial for modeling interactions between land use changes and environmental processes, thereby reducing errors and increasing the reliability of model predictions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 更详细的土地覆盖数据集的开发可以显著提高生态、水文和大气模型的准确性，因为它提供了精确的输入参数。这种改进对于模拟土地利用变化与环境过程之间的相互作用至关重要，从而减少错误并提高模型预测的可靠性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the variability in classification accuracies of land-cover datasets, particularly in river basin areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致流域地区土地覆盖数据集分类准确性变异的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability in classification accuracies is due to differences in data quality and properties, absence of a standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories, and inconsistencies with Earth System Model requirements. In river basin areas, the highest uncertainty often arises from classifying cropland and grassland categories and dryland systems among shrub, grassland, and forest categories.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 分类准确性的变异性源于数据质量和特性的差异、缺乏将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别的标准方法，以及与地球系统模型要求的不一致。在流域地区，分类农田和草地类别以及干旱地区系统（如灌木、草地和森林类别）时，通常会出现最高的不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why do certain land-cover datasets fail to meet the requirements of Earth System Models?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 某些土地覆盖数据集为何未能满足地球系统模型的要求？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Land-cover datasets often fail to meet the requirements of Earth System Models because they cannot directly map the concept of Plant Functional Types (PFTs), whose traits represent a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions used in these models.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集往往无法满足地球系统模型的要求，因为它们无法直接映射植物功能类型（PFTs）的概念，这些类型的特征代表了一系列光谱关系，以及在这些模型中使用的气候、生态和理论假设的组合。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the challenges in using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图面临的挑战有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping include increased computational loading due to the volume of data and the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data, which lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its application.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的挑战包括由于数据量大而导致的计算负荷增加，以及HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，这降低了其可用性并增加了应用的难度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the temporal frequency of data collection from HJ-1/CCD satellites affect the quality and usability of land cover mapping?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD卫星的数据采集时间频率如何影响土地覆盖制图的质量和可用性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of time series HJ-1/CCD data, which provides monthly datasets, greatly enhances the accuracy of land cover mapping. Despite challenges related to increased computational load and the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data, this approach leads to a marked improvement in classification accuracy, achieving over 95% in some areas. The temporal advantage allows for better depiction of land surface variations, which significantly enhances classification results compared to single-date data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据（提供每月数据集）大大提高了土地覆盖制图的准确性。尽管面临计算负荷增加以及HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳等挑战，但这种方法在某些区域的分类准确率超过95%。时间上的优势使得土地表面变化的表现更为准确，相较于单日期数据，显著提升了分类结果。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of relying on optical remotely sensed imagery for land-cover classification in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 依赖光学遥感影像进行干旱地区土地覆盖分类的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Relying solely on optical remotely sensed imagery for land-cover classification in arid regions can lead to high uncertainty and classification errors, particularly between categories like cropland, grassland, shrub, and forest. These inaccuracies are due to variations in the minimum threshold required for forest cover and affect eco-hydrological and land-process modeling, potentially causing significant errors or modeling failures.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 仅依赖光学遥感影像进行干旱地区的土地覆盖分类可能会导致较高的不确定性和分类错误，特别是在农田、草地、灌木和森林等类别之间。这些不准确性源于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值的变化，并影响生态水文和土地过程建模，可能导致显著的错误或建模失败。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the main objective of employing multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data for mapping land cover with fine spatial resolution?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 采用多种分类器和多源遥感数据进行细粒度土地覆盖制图的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main objective is to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling by providing more detailed and accurate categories of crop/vegetation, which can address the uncertainties in land-cover classification, especially in arid regions like the HRB.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是通过提供更详细和准确的作物/植被分类来提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，以应对干旱地区（如HRB）土地覆盖分类中的不确定性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a method for finer resolution land cover mapping using time series data from HJ-1/CCD?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么使用HJ-1/CCD的时间序列数据开发更精细的土地覆盖制图方法很重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important because it takes advantage of the spatiotemporal capabilities of HJ-1/CCD data to significantly enhance the accuracy of land cover mapping, which is crucial for understanding interactions between global changes and human activities, and for improving ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric models.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 这很重要，因为它利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空能力显著提高了土地覆盖制图的准确性，这对于理解全球变化与人类活动之间的相互作用，以及改善生态、水文和大气模型至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the rationale behind using a mosaic of Landsat/TM imagery as a base image for land cover classification?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat/TM影像拼接作为土地覆盖分类的基础影像的理由是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The rationale is to use the mosaic of Landsat/TM imagery as a reference for automatically correcting and preprocessing HJ-1/CCD images, facilitating the creation of time series mosaics that improve the accuracy of classification and reduce uncertainties in land-cover datasets, particularly in arid regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 该方案是利用Landsat/TM影像的马赛克作为参考，自动校正和预处理HJ-1/CCD影像，从而便于创建时间序列马赛克，提高分类的准确性，并减少干旱地区土地覆盖数据集的不确定性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to ensure the accuracy of land-cover classification when using multisource remotely sensed data for mapping eco-hydrological processes?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在使用多源遥感数据进行生态水文过程映射时，确保土地覆盖分类准确性的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: A comprehensive method is developed for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands. This involves creating a mosaic of the study area using Landsat/TM imagery and using this as a base image for automatic corrections through image-to-image registration. The preprocessing includes converting DN values to TOA radiance, removing atmospheric effects to obtain surface reflectance, and constructing time series mosaics from HJ-1/CCD data.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 开发了一种综合方法，通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，以细致的空间分辨率绘制每月土地覆盖图。这涉及使用Landsat/TM影像创建研究区域的马赛克，并将其作为自动校正的基础影像，通过影像间配准进行校正。预处理包括将DN值转换为TOA辐射率，去除大气影响以获得表面反射率，以及从HJ-1/CCD数据构建时间序列马赛克。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the effective integration of multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data for enhanced land cover mapping accuracy?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论能够有效整合多种分类器和多源遥感数据，以提高土地覆盖制图的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: A comprehensive method is developed by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，开发了一种综合方法，以提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do advancements in atmospheric correction techniques enable more accurate surface reflectance retrieval from remote sensing images?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 大气校正技术的进步如何使遥感图像中表面反射率的提取更加准确？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Removing atmospheric effects from remote-sensing images through correction techniques enables obtaining surface reflectance, which is crucial for accurate land cover classification and mapping.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过校正技术去除遥感图像中的大气效应，可以获得表面反射率，这对于准确的土地覆盖分类和制图至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be significant variability in land-cover dataset classification for eco-hydrological modeling?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在生态水文模型的土地覆盖数据集分类中可能存在显著的变异性？
Expectation.AnswerEn: There is significant variability in land-cover dataset classification due to differences in data quality and properties, lack of a standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover, and inconsistencies with Earth System Model requirements. This variability can result in high uncertainty, particularly in classifying cropland and grassland categories and dryland systems among shrub, grassland, and forest categories.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集分类存在显著的变异性，这主要是由于数据质量和属性的差异、缺乏对连续植被覆盖分类的标准方法，以及与地球系统模型要求的不一致。这种变异性可能导致高不确定性，特别是在分类农田和草地类别以及在灌木、草地和森林类别之间的干旱系统时。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when using remote sensing data with high spatial resolution for land cover mapping?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用高空间分辨率的遥感数据进行土地覆盖制图时可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges with high spatial resolution remote sensing data for land cover mapping include the dramatic increase in computation load due to large data volume and the potential reduction in usability caused by not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of certain data sources like HJ-1/CCD.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 高空间分辨率遥感数据在土地覆盖制图中的挑战包括由于数据量大而导致的计算负担显著增加，以及某些数据源（如HJ-1/CCD）几何和辐射质量不佳可能导致的可用性降低。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it difficult to directly map plant functional types using remote-sensing land-cover datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么直接使用遥感土地覆盖数据集来映射植物功能类型是困难的？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is difficult to directly map plant functional types using remote-sensing land-cover datasets because the concept of plant functional types involves traits that are a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions which cannot be easily captured using remote-sensing techniques.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 直接使用遥感土地覆盖数据集映射植物功能类型是困难的，因为植物功能类型的概念涉及到光谱关系、气候、生态和理论假设的组合特征，这些特征无法通过遥感技术轻易捕捉。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the data collection methods used to enhance the accuracy of land cover mapping in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您对用于提高干旱地区土地覆盖制图准确性的资料收集方法的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data collection methods, which include the use of multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands, are effective in improving the accuracy of land cover mapping. These methods address the high uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical imagery, particularly in distinguishing between cropland, grassland, and forest categories in dryland systems. The overall classification accuracy achieved is significantly higher than previous approaches, indicating a robust methodology.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法，包括使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，能够有效提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。这些方法解决了光学影像在土地覆盖分类中存在的高不确定性，特别是在干旱地区区分农田、草地和森林类别时。所达到的整体分类准确性显著高于以往的方法，表明该方法具有较强的可靠性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you assess the challenges faced in using remote sensing data for land use and land cover mapping, particularly in terms of data quality and computational demands?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估在使用遥感数据进行土地利用和土地覆盖制图时面临的挑战，特别是在数据质量和计算需求方面？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges in using remote sensing data for land use and land cover mapping are significant. They include the high computational demands due to the use of large datasets and the issues with the geometric and radiometric qualities of certain satellite data, such as HJ-1/CCD. These factors can lower usability and increase the difficulty of accurately mapping land cover. Despite these challenges, the use of advanced data collection methods has resulted in high mapping accuracy, demonstrating the potential to overcome these obstacles.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用遥感数据进行土地利用和土地覆盖制图面临着重大挑战。这些挑战包括由于使用大数据集而导致的高计算需求，以及某些卫星数据（如HJ-1/CCD）的几何和辐射质量问题。这些因素可能降低可用性，并增加准确制图土地覆盖的难度。尽管面临这些挑战，先进的数据收集方法的使用已导致高制图精度，显示出克服这些障碍的潜力。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, what are the prospects for utilizing time series data in improving the accuracy of land cover classification?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，利用时间序列数据来提高土地覆盖分类的准确性有哪些前景？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The utilization of time series data holds promising prospects for improving the accuracy of land cover classification. The time series data, especially from sources like HJ-1/CCD, allows for depicting variations in typical land surfaces over time, leading to improved classification accuracy. The increase in overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient when using time series data compared to single datasets suggests that this approach provides a more comprehensive understanding of land cover dynamics.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 时间序列数据的利用在提高土地覆盖分类的准确性方面具有良好的前景。来自HJ-1/CCD等来源的时间序列数据能够描绘典型土地表面随时间的变化，从而提高分类准确性。与单一数据集相比，使用时间序列数据时整体准确性和Kappa系数的提高表明，这种方法提供了对土地覆盖动态更全面的理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in improving the accuracy of land-use classification in arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定在改善干旱地区土地利用分类的准确性方面面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: In arid regions, the highest uncertainty in land-cover classification occurs frequently between categories like cropland and grassland. This is due to differences in minimum forest cover thresholds, which can lead to large uncertainties and errors in eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，土地覆盖分类中最高的不确定性通常发生在农田和草地等类别之间。这是由于最低森林覆盖阈值的差异，可能导致生态水文和土地过程建模中的巨大不确定性和错误。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why using time series data might enhance land-cover mapping accuracy.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么使用时间序列数据可能会提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Time series data provide a continuous depiction of land surface changes over time, which enhances mapping accuracy. As seen with the HJ-1/CCD data, the time series approach significantly improved classification accuracy and the Kappa coefficient compared to single data instances.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 时间序列数据提供了对土地表面变化的连续描述，从而提高了制图的准确性。正如HJ-1/CCD数据所示，时间序列方法显著提高了分类准确性和Kappa系数，相较于单一数据实例。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore how remote sensing data with varying spatial and temporal resolutions can be integrated to enhance land cover mapping accuracy in eco-hydrological research.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨如何将具有不同空间和时间分辨率的遥感数据整合，以提高生态水文研究中的土地覆盖制图精度。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands can improve land cover mapping accuracy. Specifically, HJ-1/CCD data, Landsat TM/ETM+, and MODIS data are integrated to create detailed land cover maps that cater to eco-hydrological modeling requirements.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据可以提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。具体而言，HJ-1/CCD数据、Landsat TM/ETM+和MODIS数据被整合以创建满足生态水文模型需求的详细土地覆盖图。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please examine the methodologies for validating land cover mapping results using very high resolution remote sensing data, focusing on the potential improvements in mapping accuracy.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请检查使用超高分辨率遥感数据验证土地覆盖制图结果的方法，重点关注提高制图准确性的潜在改进。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Validation of land cover mapping can be performed using very high resolution remote sensing data from sources like Google Earth. This approach provides high mapping accuracy, with results showing an overall accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% in different study areas, demonstrating significant improvements over single dataset classifications.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖制图的验证可以使用来自谷歌地球等来源的超高分辨率遥感数据进行。这种方法提供了高映射精度，结果显示在不同研究区域的总体准确率分别为95.76%和83.78%，显示出相较于单一数据集分类的显著改进。
